_sText:
Destroyed wall + sequence

Made by The Giblets of Jesus

It's been a while since I last time I put any content so I thought I might upload this little sequence I made for a friend.

Basically, once the button is pressed, 2 explosion will be triggered (physics + normal) and the 2 brushes will be enabled and disabled, making a hole in the wall.

Sadly I couldn't really be arsed to create gibs for the sequence, perhaps an update will come one day, who knows.


AND THEN I DID :D
http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5618



As with all my prefabs, if you do decide to use this prefab in one of your fine maps, I'd like to be credited for the prefab used :).
